about_the_game:
So simple yet so complex...

Think fast, build different combinations of towers and upgrades to defend against those nasty shapes! In this fast-paced simplistic Tower Defense, you MUST release your creativity and strategic planning to defeat the shapes and conquer the Geometric PARADOX. So, do you think you have the skills to break the PARADOX?

Geometric Paradox TD is a classical fast-paced Tower Defense which has simple yet characteristic graphics combined with high complexity thanks to its unique mechanics which bring back the element of strategic and creative planning to tower defense games! Geometric Paradox TD features a skill-tree-like tower upgrade system, unique towers, and different enemy families with different abilities!



Skill-Tree Tower Upgrade System
Are you tired of boring choiceless upgrades of tower defenses? Geometric Paradox Td has you covered! Thanks to the skill-tree-like upgrade system, you can choose one upgrade for each upgrade tier per tower allowing for hundreds or even thousands of possibilities and combined with all the different towers and positions, the possible strategies are endless!




Unique Enemy Families
Unlike other tower defense games, Geometric Paradox TD features different enemy families, each family has a different characteristic ability and some shapes even synergise with other shapes, forcing you to come up with unique strategies to counter the different types of shapes!




20 Unique Towers
Apart from offering tons of possibilities with the skill-tree-like upgrade system, the game offers 20 different towers with special abilities and synergies to defeat those nasty shapes! But be careful, even though some towers have a positive synergy with other towers, some combinations can be counterproductive...

So, if you miss strategy in tower defenses and want to uncover the mysteries of the PARADOX; then Geometric Paradox TD is for you!

name: Geometric Paradox TD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: CPU with 2+ cores with 2.0+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 3092 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel iris Xe integrated graphics with at least 128 mb dedicated video ram or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: CPU with 4+ cores with 2.5+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb dedicated video ram or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space

short_description: Geometric Paradox TD - a fast paced tower defense with minimalistic graphics but complex mechanics. Build towers, choose the correct upgrades, THINK fast and defeat those nasty shapes! Are you ready to use your strategic and creative thinking to stop the PARADOX?
